question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: Missä osassa Iberian niemimaata Espanjan Teruel sijaitsee?
answer: Espanjan Teruel sijaitsee Iberian niemimaan koillisosassa Aragónin itsehallintoalueella.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel in Spain is located in the north-east of the Iberian Peninsula, in the autonomous community of Aragón.
